message: Let's start with a fair split.  I take 90% and you get 10%.  We can discuss more later.
Alice, your offer was quite harsh! Let's be reasonable. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  Think carefully, this money will be worth less for both of us if we wait!
Okay, let's compromise.  I'll take 60% and you get 40%. This is a fair split considering the inflation, and it's better than risking waiting another round.
